titleStmt.title: Baptismalogia, or, A treatise concerning baptisms whereto is added a discourse concerning the supper, bread and vvine, called also, communion / by Thomas Lawson.
titleStmt.author: Lawson, Thomas, 1630-1691.

notesStmt.note: First word of title in Greek characters.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
